parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Identity

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the rank of the given unit. Rank can be one of the following:
* <tt>"PRIVATE"</tt>
* <tt>"CORPORAL"</tt>
* <tt>"SERGEANT"</tt>
* <tt>"LIEUTENANT"</tt>
* <tt>"CAPTAIN"</tt>
* <tt>"MAJOR"</tt>
* <tt>"COLONEL"</tt>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''rank''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_rank = [[rank]] player;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[rating]], [[addRating]], [[setUnitRank]], [[ArmA: Rating Values|Rating Values]]
</value></part></template>



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
